original: <color=#FFE787>使用限制：</color><color=#ccffcc>所有場合皆可使用</color>降低敵方 <color=#ccffcc>100</color> 點士氣，並隨機傳送<color=#ccffcc>1</color>個敵方部隊回到後方，且造成以下<color=#ccffcc>2</color>種異常狀態。<color=#FFE787>中毒：</color>每秒 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4943)@</color> 點體力，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4943)@</color> 秒<color=#FFE787>緩速：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4946)@</color> 點移動速度，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4946)@</color> 秒
text: <color=#FFE787>Usage restrictions: </color><color=#ccffcc>Can be used in all occasions</color> Reduce enemy morale by <color=#ccffcc>100</color> and send randomly <color=#ccffcc>1</color> enemy troops returned to the rear and caused the following <color=#ccffcc>2</color> abnormal conditions. <color=#FFE787>Poisoning:  </color><color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4943)@</color> points physical strength per second, continuous <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4943)@</color> Seconds <color=#FFE787>Slow speed: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Status_MS(4946)@</color> Point moving speed, continuous <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4946)@</color> Seconds
